question.questionText: Andi and Scott decided to investigate solar water heaters using collectors of different colors (but the same size) as one variable and covered versus uncovered as a second variable. Look at the graph of their data and answer the questions below. What does the graph tell you about the effect of using a cover?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: Water heats up faster when covered.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: That the uncovered items are colder than the covered items.
If the heater is covered the water is hotter faster.
The covered container can conceal heat.
That it maybe gets hotter than uncovered.
